name: Niflhel's Fables: The Book of Gypsies
name_original: Niflhel's Fables: The Book of Gypsies
description:
A visual novel with a fabulous atmosphere where your every choice matters.


Ruff and his brothers went to haymaking one day. His brothers punished him — do not lie down in the heat on the boundary under a broom bush. Did not listen to the brothers Ruff. This is where his misadventures began.

"Navi tales: the Book of Gypsies" is a visual novel, from the pages of which the midday summer heat is bursting. The setting is based on Slavic folklore.

"Navi Tales" is a prequel to another game of our studio - "Navi Day".
